EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.DC Metro Area Blast 8-22-18
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re extending this SpringOne Platform discount just for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, As a member of the greater D.C.–area tech community, we'd love to connect with you at this year's SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-dc-area-2018]]>. With over 2000 attendees, 150+ sessions on the hottest tech topics, and the coolest industry speakers around—not to mention fun parties, networking opportunities, and more—SpringOne Platform is the perfect place to learn how to build software people love.
Although our SpringOne Platform discount codes have expired, we’re extending a special deal for our friends in the D.C. metropolitan area.
Register by Friday, September 7th to receive $400 off your ticket!
The conference will take place at the Gaylord National Resort & Convention Center from September 24–27. We’re adding new speakers and sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-dc-area-2018]]> every day, so keep an eye on the SpringOne Platform website <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-dc-area-2018]]> for updates. We’ll also have several local, national, and federal government-related sessions, which you can learn more about here <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Federal-Agencies-at-SpringOne-Platform.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-dc-area-2018]]>.
Please use discount code Attendee_DC400 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-dc-area-2018]]> for $400 off the price of a standard conference pass.
Don't hesitate—register now!
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
